casebody.data:
MARTIN
v.
SLAGEL 210P16-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 4, 2018 Michael T. Wood, Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Dale P. Martin, for Martin, Dale Patrick.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of October 2018 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th of October 2018."
